capsules_submitted.utterance: I think Professor McGonagall is definitely an adult. I mean, she's been teaching at Hogwarts for years and has a pretty established career in the wizarding world. She's not someone you'd typically associate with being young or immature.

I mean, can you believe she was only 36 when she became a full professor? That's incredible. And as an adult, she's still got so much energy and spirit.
